segment.source: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command
segment.target: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command

segment.source: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command
segment.target: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command

segment.source: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command
segment.target: How to Upgrade a Package Using the Open Package Command

segment.source: Use the Open Package command to upgrade or apply an update to a sequenced application package.
segment.target: Use the Open Package command to upgrade or apply an update to a sequenced application package.

segment.source: When you upgrade an existing virtual application package using the command line, the original version of the .sft file is deleted.
segment.target: When you upgrade an existing virtual application package using the command line, the original version of the .sft file is deleted.

segment.source: You should backup the associated .sft file before upgrading the package using the command line.
segment.target: You should backup the associated .sft file before upgrading the package using the command line.

segment.source: To upgrade a package using the Open Package command
segment.target: To upgrade a package using the Open Package command

segment.source: To open the package that will be upgraded, in the Application Virtualization (App-V) console select File, Open Package for Upgrade.
segment.target: To open the package that will be upgraded, in the Application Virtualization (App-V) console select File, Open Package for Upgrade.

segment.source: In the Open dialog box, select the package that will be upgraded.
segment.target: In the Open dialog box, select the package that will be upgraded.

segment.source: To start the Sequencing wizard, select Tools, Sequencing Wizard.
segment.target: To start the Sequencing wizard, select Tools, Sequencing Wizard.

segment.source: Complete the wizard applying the configuration changes, to save the new sequenced application, select File, Save.
segment.target: Complete the wizard applying the configuration changes, to save the new sequenced application, select File, Save.

segment.source: To append the version number to the package name, in the Sequencer console, select Tools, Options.
segment.target: To append the version number to the package name, in the Sequencer console, select Tools, Options.

segment.source: Select Append Package Version to Filename.
segment.target: Select Append Package Version to Filename.

segment.source: Updating the file name with the package version is essential to successfully completing the upgrade.
segment.target: Updating the file name with the package version is essential to successfully completing the upgrade.

segment.source: How to Manage Virtual Applications Using the Command Line
segment.target: How to Manage Virtual Applications Using the Command Line
